sentences.en: ‘My leg!’ he gasped. ‘I think it’s broken!’
sentences.cn: “我的腿！”他倒抽一口气喊道，“我觉得腿断了！”

sentences.en: a last-gasp 2-1 victory
sentences.cn: 最后一刻取得的2:1的胜利

sentences.en: An audible gasp went round the court as the jury announced the verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团宣布判决的时候，听到法庭上有人倒抽了一口气。

sentences.en: As the gladiators rolled away from the starting gates, a gasp went up when the Scottish cyclist's left foot clicked out of the pedal.
sentences.cn: 矫健的自行车手们纷纷骑车冲出起跑门，突然苏格兰选手的左脚咔嗒一声踩空了踏板，观众不禁倒抽了一口冷气。

sentences.en: Brendan climbed slowly, gasping for breath.
sentences.cn: 布伦丹上气不接下气地缓慢攀爬。

sentences.en: Even though at their last gasp, the enemies will still put up their deathbed struggle.
sentences.cn: 即使是奄奄一息, 敌人也还是要作垂死挣扎的.

sentences.en: He heard a snuffle behind him - a half - choking gasp or cough.
sentences.cn: 他听到背后有一种吸鼻子的声音 -- 仿佛喘不出气或者咳嗽的声音.

sentences.en: He snatched a last gasp winner.
sentences.cn: 他在最后关头一举夺冠。

sentences.en: His hands flew up, he gave a sort of gasp, and fell.
sentences.cn: 汤姆双手向上伸了一下, 发出一声像是喘息的声音便倒在了地上.

sentences.en: I heard myself gasp and cry out.
sentences.cn: 我听到自己一边喘一边喊。

sentences.en: I’m gasping for a pint!
sentences.cn: 我好想喝一大杯啤酒啊！

sentences.en: She gave a gasp of surprise.
sentences.cn: 她吃惊得大口喘气.

sentences.en: She gave a little gasp and clutched George’s hand.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地倒抽一口气，抓住了乔治的手。

sentences.en: She shrank back with an involuntary gasp.
sentences.cn: 她不由得倒抽了口冷气，往后退了退。

sentences.en: The enemy are at their last gasp.
sentences.cn: 敌人在做垂死的挣扎.

sentences.en: the last gasp of the cold war.
sentences.cn: 冷战的最后时刻。

sentences.en: The team were at their last gasp.
sentences.cn: 球队正在做最后的拼搏.

sentences.en: There was a gasp and a flurry at Winston's side.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿身旁有人倒吸一口气.

sentences.en: This voice made the boys gasp and quake. It was Injun Joe's!
sentences.cn: 这个声音吓得两个孩子喘不过气来,直发抖, 是印第安-乔的声音!

sentences.en: Today, we no longer gasp when we hear a teenage girl is pregnant or whisper about unmarried couples who live together.
sentences.cn: 今天，我们听到未成年少女怀孕时不会再感到惊讶，也不会再去私下谈论谁谁未婚同居。

words.tran_cn: 气喘吁吁地说；喘着气说话

phrases.tran_cn: 呼吸十分困难， 上气不接下气
精疲力竭；奄奄一息；最后一刻

trans.tran_en: when you take in a breath suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain
to breathe quickly in a way that can be heard because you are having difficulty breathing
to breathe in suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain
